sentences.english: They were rioting all night after the boat race.
The team had hiked through the night and reached Mount Rainier 's summit at dawn.
sentences.chinese: 这支队伍彻夜攀登，破晓时登上雷尼尔山的顶峰。

sentences.english: She is in attendance on the sick child.
sentences.chinese: 我陪伴着生病的孩子彻夜未眠。

sentences.english: The lights in the hall burned all night.
I stayed awake throughout the stormy night.
sentences.chinese: 那个暴风雨的夜晚我彻夜未眠。

sentences.english: The males make a loud croaking sound that can be heard during the night.
sentences.chinese: 其雄性蛙类会发出响亮的聒噪声，彻夜不息。

sentences.english: The noise of the street kept me awake in the night.
sentences.chinese: 街上的喧嚣声让我彻夜难眠。

sentences.english: Too excited to sleep, he had stayed up all night waiting for orientation at the English Language Institute to begin.
sentences.chinese: 他兴奋的彻夜未眠，等待着英语语言学院的报到。

sentences.english: All that night she lay awake, thinking about her future.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上她彻夜未眠，思考着她的未来。

sentences.english: First, you see more and more dark windows.
sentences.chinese: 首先，伦敦那些晚上彻夜黑灯的住宅越来越多。

sentences.english: I hadn't slept all night. My neck and back were like coiled 7 springs, and my eyes stung 8.
sentences.chinese: 我彻夜未眠，脖子和后背像绷紧的钢丝，眼睛刺痛。

sentences.english: Fear can keep us up all night long, but faith makes one fine pillow.
sentences.chinese: 恐惧令人彻夜难眠，信心却可教人安枕。

sentences.english: He lay awake almost the whole night.
I have trouble sleeping nights without a job. Am I a lazy man?
sentences.chinese: 因为没活干，我彻夜难眠，难道我是个懒人吗？

sentences.english: The mother sat up all night with the sick child.
sentences.chinese: 母亲彻夜不眠守候着那生病的孩子。

sentences.english: Your last mail made me trouble sleeping whole night.
sentences.chinese: 你的上封邮件让我彻夜难眠。

definition: overnight until daybreak (idiom); all night long/day and night
the whole night/all through the night
midnight/in the middle of the night
to light a lamp/to raise a lantern
to raise a lantern and fight at night (idiom); fig. to work into the night/to burn the midnight oil
without stopping to sleep or have a rest (idiom)
